description:
Douki-chan accidentally sends her cosplay selfie to Douki-kun. Out of embarrassment, she calls in sick. But she gets this weird feeling and decides to go to work.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hazukashii Jidori Shashin o Okurarete Shimatta Kaisha no Douki
My Coworker Who Received an Embarrassing Selfie
恥ずかしい自撮り写真を送られてしまった会社の同期
